title: MarkLogic University - Introduction to Geospatial Search
abstract: In this one-hour session, we will explore the capabilities of MarkLogic Server in dealing with geospatial data. We will look at the geospatial index and search capabilities, and then spend the majority of the hour customizing a specific App Builder project in order to integrate with 3rd party mapping tools like Google Maps and Google Earth. This is a hands-on session so please bring your laptop. We will have several laptops available on a first-come, first-serve basis.
